title: Possible to Delete Account?
body: I don't want to play this game anymore. It makes me miserable. My life is garbage so I can't stop with will power alone. I want my account deleted so I will hopefully won't have any motivation to play.

It sucks to hear that your experience hasn't been so great, so I can definitely understand wanting to take a break.  :/  If you want, you can just let your account remain as it is so you can come back whenever you feel ready to.  If it's really come down to it, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do.  Our account team will get back to you through there.
